name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Widgets - Control Hue lights, Spotify, Weather, Clocks, and more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable dashboard with widgets to control Hue lights, manage Spotify, jot notes, get weather updates, view clocks, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Formerly known as New Tab for Hue.

🆕 New Tab Widgets - Level up your new tab start page. 
A customizable dashboard with useful widgets to control Philips Hue lights, manage Spotify playback, jot down sticky notes, get weather updates, view world clocks, and heaps more. Choose from millions of wallpapers.

Widgets
💡 Hue Scene Widget
Quickly change and set your Philips Hue smart lights to a premade scene.

💡 Hue Group Widget
Toggle on and off a Hue group or room, control individual Hue lights, or set the colors of your Hue smart lights. PRO users can also select scenes from a menu by right-clicking the widget.

🎉 Hue Bookmark Scene Widget
Set a Hue scene and go to a website in one click. Perfect for quick transitions like "Netflix and chill."

☀️ Weather Widget
View the current weather forecast for any location of your choice.

📝 Sticky Note Widget
Jot down notes, ideas, or create quick to-do lists directly on your new tab page.

🔵 Link Widget
Quickly access your most-used websites. Keeps a counter of how often you visit your favorite sites.

🌐 Top Websites Widget
Shows a list of your most visited sites. Requires optional browser permissions.

🎵 Spotify Widget
Control Spotify playback. Right-click to open a mini browser to search the Spotify catalog, view recently played tracks, and liked songs.

📋 Copy to Clipboard Widget
Create a button that copies a custom message or text to the clipboard when clicked.

🛒 OzBargain Widget
For Aussies, display the top current/popular deals from OzBargain.

⛽ FuelWatch Widget
For Western Australians, show the current petrol price for a fuel station and tomorrow's price when available (after 2pm AWST).

🕰️ World Clock Widget
Displays a beautiful analog clock for any timezone. Customizable.

🕵️ Recently Visited Widget
Shows a list of your most recently visited links from your browser history. Requires optional browser permissions.


Other Features
📚 Custom Pages
Add more organization to your new tab start page. Create multiple pages to hold various widgets. Freely move widgets around to design your perfect layout and new tab start page. PRO users have access to unlimited pages.

☁️ Cloud Syncing
Keep your widgets and pages seamlessly synced across all your devices. Requires a PRO subscription.

📖 Bookmarks Viewer
Search and access your saved bookmarks quickly. Add bookmarks directly as link widgets to your dashboard from the context menu. Requires optional browser permissions.

🖼️ Welcome Screen
Displays the current time, day, and date in a minimal overlay, keeping your background image as the focus.

🖼️ Millions of Wallpapers
Search for anything from 4k nature landscapes to cityscapes at night, or even abstract art.

🖼️ Custom Backgrounds
Upload your own background image, set a custom color, or choose from hand-picked colors.
